name: I have no idea
description:
I have no idea is our entry for Ludum Dare #45. We were 4 working during 48 hours ( Elie Paquiet , Valentin Sophys, Anastasia Thevenin & Maxime Hanot ).

CONTROLS  : 

Left click to select block.

Click on "Run" after selecting.

Link to Ludum Dare project :

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/$163306

Hope you guys will like the game ! Cheers !
